item.description:
Report X-2024120313

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-05T12:24:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-22
  • City: GREENSBORO
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: CALL WAS MADE TO THE DMP CAGE ABOUT A POSSIBLE LEAKING HAZMAT PACKAGE. DESIGNATED RESPONDER FOUND A PACKAGE ON THE FLOOR WET AND LEAKING. FOLLOWING ALL PROPER RESPONDER METHODS, THE PACKAGE WAS SECURED AND RETURNED TO THE DMP CAGE TO BE PROCESSED.
